newsitem.title: USA: GOLF-SCORES AT BUICK INVITATIONAL AFTER FIRST ROUND.
newsitem.headline: GOLF-SCORES AT BUICK INVITATIONAL AFTER FIRST ROUND.

text.p: Leading scores
after the first round of the $1.5 million Buick Invitational
on Thursday at Torrey Pines GC, South Course, 7,000 yards,
North Course, 6,592 yards, both par 72 (players U.S. unless
noted):
64 Bob Tway
65 Jay Don Blake, Olin Browne, Taylor Smith
66 Dan Forsman, Frank Lickliter, Tom Pernice Jr.
67 Dave Stockton Jr, Craig Stalder, Brad Fabel, Joel Edwards,
Skip Kendall, Mark Wiebe, Mike Brisky, Steve Lowery, Mark
O'Meara, Tom Kite, Ed Fiori, David Ogrin
68 Steve Pate, Peter, Pete Jordan, Fred Funk, Tim Herron,
Adam Mednick, Robert Damron, Mike Hulbert, Marco Dawson, Curt
Byrum, Omar Uresti, Dicky Pride, Jimmy Green, David Berganio
Add international scores
69 Howard Clark (Britain)
70 Jesper Parnevik (Sweden)
71 Sandy Lyle (Britain), Gabriel Hjertstedt (Sweden)
72 Hideki Kase (Japan)
73 Rafail Alarcon (Mexico)
74 Phil Tataurangi (New Zealand)
76 Massy Kuramoto (Japan)
